editorArea.headline: Modeling Exercise
editorArea.content: On this page you will solve a modeling exercise. We will guide you on how to do that.

addEditUmlElement.headline: Add and edit UML elements
addEditUmlElement.content: To add a UML element, drag and drop one of the UML elements into the editor area.
addEditUmlElement.hint: You can edit the UML element by double-clicking it.

createAssociation.headline: Create and edit associations
createAssociation.content: Select the source class to see four blue semicircles. Click and hold on one of those and drag it to another blue semicircle to create a relationship.
createAssociation.hint: You can change the relationship type by double-clicking it.

executeTasks.headline: Modeling exercise.
executeTasks.content: Solve the exercise below and proceed to the next step.
executeTasks.personClass: Create the UML class <tt>Person</tt> with the attribute <tt>name: String</tt>
executeTasks.studentClass: Create the UML class <tt>Student</tt> with the attribute <tt>major: String</tt> and method <tt>visitLecture()</tt>.
executeTasks.association: Make sure that <tt>Student</tt> is a subclass of <tt>Person</tt>.

submit.headline: Submit your solution
submit.content: You can submit your solution here and then wait for your feedback.
submit.hint: You can submit multiple times until the exercise deadline. Your last submission will count towards your score.
